name: CGWindowImageOption
desc: The data type to use to specify the type of image to be generated for a window.

items.name: static var bestResolution: CGWindowImageOption
items.desc: When capturing the window, return the best image resolution. The returned image size may be different than the screen size.

items.name: static var nominalResolution: CGWindowImageOption
items.desc: When capturing the window, return the nominal image resolution. The returned image size is the same as the screen size.
